name: Terminator of Christmas Gifts
description:
Happy Christmas

Hi, welcome to Terminator of Christmas Gifts! This is a 2 player game. Play with Your Friend and enjoy Christmas! Get as many presents from the opposite side as you can! Be careful! Your friend might hit you!

Keyboard:

Player1

  •    [AD] to Move 
  •     [W] to Jump
  • [H] to Aim
  • [J] to Shoot

Player2:

  • [ ←→] to Move
  • [↑] to Jump
  • [1] to Aim
  • [2] to Shoot
Presents are dropping from the Sky! Let's shoot them!
